examples: He related an involved story about every ancestor since 1895.

definitions.definition: Associated with others, be a participant or make someone be a participant (in a crime, process, etc.)
examples: The people involved in the project for three years.
He got/was involved in a bar fight.
When the family wrapped up my father's will, no one tried to make me feel involved .

secondary_definitions: Associated with others, be a participant or make someone be a participant (in a crime, process, etc.)
